item.title: PhD Student Research Abroad: Fulbright Information Session Feb. 4th at Noon
item.description: Date: Wednesday, February 4, 2026 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM - PhD students interested in collaborating with faculty at foreign universities may complete their dissertation research abroad. To travel fall of 2027, join the virtual information session this February 4th at noon. U.S. citizenship required. Register for the Fulbright Information session: https://surveys.rpi.edu/jfe/form/SV_6L3FFwv0qCROrvE Questions: email madige@rpi.edu

item.title: Spring 2026 Add Deadline/Drop without a W grade Deadline Extended
item.description: Due to inclement weather and possible processing issues, the Spring 2026 deadline to add courses, or drop courses without being issued a W grade, has been extended to Tuesday, January 27th.

item.title: Webinar on Friday January 30: RPI Digital Asset Management (DAM) System
item.description: Join Jim Evans, Director of MultiMedia Services, on Friday January 30 from 11am to 12pm, for a live webinar introducing Rensselaer’s Digital Asset Management System. Discover how to access campus‑wide photography, multimedia files, and institutional assets—all in one place. Register now: https://rensselaer.webex.com/webappng/sites/rensselaer/webinar/webinarSeries/register/783d951c6ab8482e9198a7bd6075a700

item.title: Campus Community Invited to ISC2 Cybersecurity Chapter Meetup | Jan 27
item.description: Date: Tuesday, January 27, 2026 6:00 PM - 7:00 PM - All are welcome to join an upcoming ISC2 Capital District NY chapter meeting for a cybersecurity briefing from the FBI, including active and emerging threats, trends in ransomware, and latest in data breaches. Open to the RPI community!

item.title: Cloud Control: Interactive Networks for Audio-Visual Performance with Eric Souther
item.description: This three-hour workshop in West Hall 211 will introduce the node-based programming environment TouchDesigner for creating real-time audiovisuals. The session will begin with a brief introduction to TouchDesigner’s interface and core concepts, followed by a demonstration of my own work created with the platform. Participants will then learn hands-on techniques for mapping data and creating interactive controls for live performance, with a focus on particle systems manipulation. Join 1/28 at 5pm.

item.title: Reminder: Arch Discovery Day Wednesday
item.description:
Fuel up with a free Shortcake Bar hosted by the Student Success Center, grab an iced coffee from the coffee cart, and take a breather with therapy dogs while you move between short, interactive sessions focused on The Arch and experiential learning opportunities. You’ll hear from peers, ask real questions, and learn how internships, away experiences, research, and hands-on learning can fit into your path forward.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
